title: Chapter 1: Introduction to AI: History and Terminology
description: An overview of the foundational history of artificial intelligence and key terminology used in the field.

title: Chapter 2: AI Techniques: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP
description: Introduction to various AI techniques including machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing.

title: Chapter 3: AI Applications: Healthcare, Finance, Marketing
description: Exploration of how AI is applied in different industries such as healthcare, finance, and marketing.

title: Chapter 4: Ethical AI: Overview and Importance
description: Discussion of the importance of ethical considerations in AI, using the book 'Weapons of Math Destruction' as a basis.

title: Chapter 5: Project Management in AI: Agile Methodologies
description: Overview of agile methodologies and their applications in managing AI projects effectively.

title: Chapter 6: Hands-on Workshop: Data Preprocessing
description: Practical workshop focused on data preprocessing techniques fundamental to AI model training.

title: Chapter 7: AI Algorithms: Basics of Supervised and Unsupervised Learning
description: Introduction to supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms as foundational concepts in AI.

title: Chapter 8: Midterm Project Presentations
description: Students present midterm projects assessing their understanding and application of AI concepts learned in class.

title: Chapter 9: Advanced AI Techniques: Reinforcement Learning
description: Examining advanced AI techniques with a focus on reinforcement learning and its applications.

title: Chapter 10: Real-World Problems and AI Solutions
description: Discussion on identifying real-world issues that can be addressed using AI solutions, fostering group discussions.

title: Chapter 11: Hands-on Workshop: Training AI Models
description: A workshop dedicated to the practical aspects of training AI models using hands-on guides.

title: Chapter 12: Ethical Considerations in AI: Bias and Fairness
description: Deep dive into ethical issues related to bias and fairness in AI technologies, based on additional readings.

title: Chapter 13: Industry Trends and Future of AI
description: A look into the emerging trends and future directions of AI, based on selected articles.

title: Chapter 14: Final Project Preparation and Review
description: Preparation phase for final projects, including a review of feedback resources to guide students' work.

title: Chapter 15: Final Project Presentations and Reflections
description: Students present their final projects, reflecting on their learning journey and the outcomes achieved.
